description: Setup instructions for the Angular frontend project of the Flight Booking System.

steps.title: Clone the Angular project repository
steps.note: Change the URL if your Angular frontend repo URL is different

steps.title: Install project dependencies
steps.note: This will install all packages listed in package.json

steps.title: Run the Angular development server
steps.note: By default, the app runs on http://localhost:4200/

steps.title: Open the application in a browser
steps.instruction: Go to http://localhost:4200/ to view the Angular application

notes: Ensure the backend API is running and accessible by the Angular app (check environment.ts for API base URL).
Use Angular CLI commands for generating components, services, and other files as needed.
If you face issues with permission or npm install, try clearing npm cache or using a Node version manager.
